programme.title: Solomon King
programme.desc: A man (Sal Watts) declares war on the Arabs who murdered his ex-lover.

programme.title: Cool Breeze
programme.desc: A paroled crook (Thalmus Rasulala) masterminds a $3 million jewelry theft to fund a bank for businessmen.

programme.title: Mr. Ricco
programme.desc: A San Francisco lawyer (Dean Martin) helps his client (Thalmus Rasulala) beat a murder rap marked by racial overtones.

programme.title: Black Shampoo
programme.desc: A black hairdresser's sexual escapades with married customers lead to a confrontation with a jealous mobster.

programme.title: TNT Jackson
programme.desc: A woman (Jeanne Bell) encounters thugs and drug dealers after traveling to Hong Kong to search for her missing brother.

programme.title: Lady Cocoa
programme.desc: Thugs try to kill a woman (Lola Falana) released from prison before she can testify against her boyfriend.

programme.title: The Deadly Art of Survival
programme.desc: A martial arts instructor struggles with drug dealers who are operating from a rival karate school called the Disco Dojo.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: One of the great Motown acts of the past several years headlines, performing the hit, "I Heard It through the Grapevine," and other selections.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Al Green sings "Let's Stay Together"; author Verta Mae Grosvenor reads form her latest book, "Thursdays and Every Other Sunday Off."

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Merry Clayton; the Reverend Jesse Jackson talks with host Ellis Haizlip about his newly formed organization, People United to Save Humanity (PUSH).

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Author Chester Himes is welcomed back from self-exile in Europe; actor Al Freeman Jr. reads from Himes' autobiography; The Dells.

programme.title: Abar: Black Superman
programme.desc: Upon moving into a bigoted neighborhood, the scientist father of a persecuted Black family gives a superpower elixir to his tough bodyguard, who thus becomes a superpowered crimefighter.

programme.title: To Kill With Intrigue
programme.desc: The Honeybee Flower gang kills everyone in Lei mansion but Siao Lei, spared by their leader because she likes him.

programme.title: The Amsterdam Kill
programme.desc: A former U.S. narcotics agent (Robert Mitchum) tries to plug an information leak behind a global drug war.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: An innocent black youth succumbs to the brutalities of prison after being duped into pleading guilty to robbery.

programme.title: Uptown Saturday Night
programme.desc: Blue-collar buddies (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) search the underworld for a winning lottery ticket lost in a nightclub holdup.
